text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO Seeing how other countries have dealt w/& continue to deal w/covid & reopening cautiously, w/intention, is in extreme contrast w/how the US fumbled its response & irresponsible reopening . It’s quite apparent that we aren’t as awesome as we’ve been told.  https://t.co/lArEYVCdqF
